entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Implicit Vector/Tuple conversions #68145
  • FormatterServices.GetUninitializedObject no longer supports delegates #68144
  • BinaryReader.Read(byte[], int, int) is a leaky abstraction #68139
  • SPMI failing in CI #68137
  • Assertion failed 'divMod->OperGet() != GT_UMOD' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #68136
  • ILCompiler does not recognize "sha1" and "sha2" Instruction Sets #68132
  • .NET 6 not support XslCompiledTransform.Load(type(myXsltCompiled_dll)) #68129
  • [API Proposal]: Add JSON null independent of .Net null #68128
  • StringWriter memory allocation #68123
  • DateTimeOffset.ToLocalTime() should return local time with adjusted DateTimeKind #68122

Closed

  • String.LastIndexOf(char, startIndex) don't do what it should according the name #68143
  • [API Proposal]: MemoryExtensions.CommonPrefixLength<T> #64271
    7.0.0
  • Analyzer Proposal: Seal internal/private types #49944
    7.0.0
  • [tools] AndroidAppBuilder dx dependence breaks on Android SDK 31.0.0 and up #65087
    7.0.0
  • Build doesn't fail if a MONO_API_FUNCTION isn't implemented #67985
    7.0.0
  • Add tests for List<T> mutations in Exists, FindAll, TrueForAll #65608
    Future
  • Improve vm's getStringLiteral for dynamic context #67956
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add MaxValue and MinValue to INumber<TSelf> interface #68120

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix handling of arm64 instruction sets in ilc #68142
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Updating System.Runtime.InteropServices.NFloat to support generic math #68141
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Remove GT_ARGPLACE nodes #68140
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix compiled / source generated lazy loop stack handling #68138
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Dynamically sized stacks in EventPipe buffer manager #68134
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr
  • ConfigurationBinder handles ISet<> #68133
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Fix very adventurous LIR::Use::GetDummyUse #68131
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Additional work for x86 support for NativeAOT #68130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • CheckValue is not a fast path for all callers #68125
    area-System.Reflection-mono, community-contribution
  • Cleaning up write barrier code #68124
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/5.0] backports #67763: fix build with musl 1.2.3 #68121
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Add MemoryExtensions.CommonPrefixLength #67929
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add note on where to find ilc #68117
  • Discard casts when storing normalize-on-load locals #66389
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Support d8 instead of dx in ApkBuilder #68084
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono] Validate public APIs have an implementation #68080
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • vm: Improve getStringLiteral for dynamic context #68055
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Change Nullable to default to enable in libraries src and ref projects #68102
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add initial version of {Last}IndexOfAnyExcept #67941
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Add SIMD support for System.Numerics.Vector4. #68098
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Switch over JIT/Methodical tests to run using merged wrappers #65597
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Default interface implementations of static virtual methods - ECMA-335 augments #67619
    documentation
  • Condition S.S.Cryptography tests on SHA1 signature support #67998
    area-System.Security
  • Double the size of the previous segment #66930
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • Retry publish crossgen as AOT (#65948) #67636
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add C instrumentation to native libs (Native PGO) #67820
  • [release/6.0] Fix passing too small args for PUTARG_STK on macOS arm64 ABI #68113
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Add {M}IBC to glossary #68111
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Add special Comparer/EqualityComparer for Nullable<Enum> #68077
  • Fix nullability warnings for NativeAOT CoreLib #65137
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove unneeded unconditional jumps #68119
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix CLR_CMAKE_USE_SYSTEM_LIBUNWIND on macOS #68116
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Make BSWAP16 nodes normalize upper 16 bits #67903
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement Tar APIs #67883
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Fix reading slightly incorrect Zip files #68106
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Use RegexCaseEquivalence table for case-insensitive backreferences #67977
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Add JSON type hierarchies as a preview feature #67961
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Bad PackageReference version string throws incredibly unhelpful error #24896

Closed

  • Sex cam #24898
  • M #24895

PullRequests

Updated

  • Support multiple runtime packs per FrameworkReference #24873

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-17
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal] Required Properties #3630
    Working Set
  • Champion: Simplified parameter null validation code #2145
    Working Set

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Inaccurate error message when attempting to use a property as a `ref` #60807
  • New inline rename dialog appearing in multiple split editors #60805
  • ENC1002 Cannot apply changes -- unexpected error:None''Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Emit.SymbolChange'' #60804
  • Speculation within attributes on local functions is broken #60801

Closed

  • Generate event doesn't work with conditional access #60811
  • MoveToNamespace crashes when moving a type in "System" namespace #35507
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix generate event handler with invalid name (#59935) #60810
    Area-IDE
  • [semi-auto-props]: Remove an already-fixed prototype #60809
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add new background analysis scope option for compiler diagnostics #60808
    Area-Analyzers
  • Handle cases where 'field' keyword shouldn't generate a field #60806
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Formatting options fallback and Document extensions #60803
    Area-IDE
  • Add IDE tests for nameof(parameter) and mitigation for speculation issue #60802
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #60798
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/required-members #60797
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Fixed crash when moving type from System namespace #60793
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #60799
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #60796
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • [semi-auto-props]: Support assigning properties from constructor #60601
    Area-Compilers, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CustomAuthenticationProvider does not work as expected(Does not fire NotifyAuthenticationStateChanged(GetAuthenticationStateAsync()); #41228
  • Random CSS class name generation #41227

Closed

  • F #41225

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix MapPath and UsePathBase's use of implicit PathStrings #41215
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview4

Updated

  • Add TypedResults static factory class for creating typed IResult objects #41161
    area-web-frameworks
  • Allow sidebar to scroll for tall menus #41062
    area-mvc, stale, community-contribution, pr: pending author input

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Clearing and readding views to a layout results in no views being displayed #6179
  • Switch control differences #6177
  • IJSRuntime throw error in MAUI Blazor Hybrid App #6176
  • The managed-implementation of HttpMessageHandler doesn't work on Android #6174
  • GraphicsView's PanGestureRecognizer not working on Windows #6173
  • Converters are not validated after navigation with debugger #6171
  • Search handler display inconsistent on andoid #6170
  • dotnet maui blazor application dotnet version upgrade issue #6169
  • System.Reflection.TargetInvocationException - NaN is not a valid value for width #6168

Closed

  • Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Tools #6175

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove the hard Tizen dependency #6172
    t/bug, p/0, area/infrastructure 🏗️, fatal, partner/tizen, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Improved Shell benchmark #6167

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-17
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Bulk (i.e. set-based) update/delete (without loading data into memory) #795
    7.0.0
  • Remote provider with a proper API controller as endpoint #27793
  • Ability to hook into model finalization? #27790
